mapper.select: select m.MEMBER_SEQ, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_EMAIL, m.MEMBER_PASSWORD, m.COURSE_SEQ, a.AUTHORITY_NAME, c.COURSE_NAME from SM_MEMBER AS m JOIN SM_MEMBERRAUTHORITY AS ma ON m.MEMBER_SEQ = ma.MEMBER_SEQ JOIN SM_AUTHORITY AS a ON ma.AUTHORITY_SEQ = a.AUTHORITY_SEQ JOIN SM_COURSE AS c ON m.COURSE_SEQ = c.COURSE_SEQ WHERE m.MEMBER_SEQ = #{MEMBER_SEQ}
